description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: 12th German Indoor Athletic Championships; Stuttgart - one millionth Leica camera produced; British Prime Minister Harold Wilson visits Germany - is shown the Wall; German "Meals on Wheels" in Munich; Cologne modern students village being built for University students; Internationaal students are shown giving display of national dancing and songs; art and handicraft school; young pianist prodigy; 9th International Swimming Festival in Bremen.
